forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 72. South wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
